page.title: 15Gamekeeping
page.content: Gamekeeping is a{custom}which has been around for hundreds of years. It first became popular in the middle ages because the landlords wanted the game for food. Today, gamekeeping is much the same as it has always been except that the{guns}and{traps}are different. Gamekeeping is a dangerous job because there is always the possibility of being attacked by{poachers.}The guns which are now used are more modern, more powerful and quick to load. The most popular guns are the 12 bore and the .22. The most popular trap is the snare which is often used.
